/usr/bin/c++    -fPIC -Wall -O3 -DNDEBUG    CMakeFiles/Demo.dir/src/caffe/common.cpp.o CMakeFiles/Demo.dir/src/caffe/common_thread.cpp.o CMakeFiles/Demo.dir/src/caffe/internal_thread.cpp.o CMakeFiles/Demo.dir/_common.cpp.o  -o Demo -rdynamic -lboost_system -lboost_thread -lboost_filesystem -lpthread -lpthread -lglog -lgflags -lhdf5_hl -lhdf5 -lhdf5_hl -lhdf5 /usr/local/cuda/lib64/libcudart.so /usr/local/cuda/lib64/libcurand.so /usr/local/cuda/lib64/libcublas.so -llapack -lcblas -latlas -Wl,-rpath,/usr/local/cuda/lib64
